title: My SF Journey
author: 5c3d12a47a00667e40dee73a
content: We touch the canvas, the canvas takes what it wants. I guess that would be considered a UFO. A big cotton ball in the sky. This is your world, whatever makes you happy you can put in it. Go crazy. Here's another little happy bush All you have to learn here is how to have fun. This is your world, whatever makes you happy you can put in it. Go crazy. Here's another little happy bush All you have to learn here is how to have fun.
